jot.physics

Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.Light

  • public class Light
extends Object
    Class that implements a light source. Based on the shadow maps tutorial available at: http://vitorpamplona.com/wiki/Shadow+Mapping+sem+Shaders
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

                                int signal)
        Update light rotation.
        Parameters:
        gl -
        signal - rotate light around the center of the scene to the left or right side depending if signal is negative or positive.
